snippet: No party, including the Democrats, should benefit from a defective political system.
abstract: Editorial claims Electoral College remains deeply defective political mechanism and should be abolished; calls for adoption of National Popular Vote plan.
lead_paragraph: No party, including the Democrats, should benefit from a defective political system.

headline.seo: The Tarnish of the Electoral College
headline.main: The Tarnish of the Electoral College
headline.print_headline: The Tarnish of the Electoral College
